page.enlisting:
• Several studied the forward problem ✓Thomason & Krider 1982 (Monte Carlo) ✓Koshak et al. 1994 (Boltzmann Diffusion) ✓Suszcynsky et al. 2000 (optical & vhf data, not theory) ✓Light et al. 2001 (Monte Carlo) ✓Davis & Marshak 2002 (Green’s functions) • Nobody published the inverse problem for channel • Neural Net (Boccippio … unknown status); probabilistic FBFD • Bayesian Inversion (Koshak); ground flash fraction retrieval • Several studied the forward problem
